name: prs-atm
description: A CLI client and also an API library for PRESS.one.

scripts.devinit: npm install -g npm-check-updates && npm install -s dev
scripts.updep: npx ncu -u && npm install && ( git commit -am 'update dependencies' || true )
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run pack && npm run readme && npm version patch && npm run updep && npm run gitsync
scripts.readme:
cat template.md > README.md && echo '
```markdown' >> README.md && ./bin/prs-atm.js >> README.md && echo '```' >> README.md && ( git commit -am 'update README.md' || true )
scripts.docker-publish-us: npm run docker-build-us && npm run docker-push-us
scripts.docker-publish-cn: npm run docker-build-cn && npm run docker-push-cn
scripts.docker-publish: npm run docker-publish-us && npm run docker-publish-cn

author: Leask Wong <i@leaskh.com>
